definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
see 急如星火[ji2 ru2 xing1 huo3]

sentences.english: He itched to tell his friends the news.
sentences.chinese: 他急于要把这消息告诉他的朋友们。

sentences.english: Lin Manhung was rushed to answer during the questioning so her attitude seemed a little tough.
sentences.chinese: 由于林满红答询时急于解释，态度略显强硬。

sentences.english: Some cadres are eager to be in short-term gain perhaps gives inside lieutenancy .
sentences.chinese: 有的干部急于在短期或者是任期内出成果。

sentences.english: Many merchants were not slow to cash in on the current China craze.
sentences.chinese: 许多商人都急于在流行的中国热中捞一把。

sentences.english: He was so eager to get to the game that he burned up the road all the way.
sentences.chinese: 他急于赶去看比赛，所以一路上风驰电掣般地开车。

sentences.english: Finally, the Yang Sen's over-anxious and compulsory policy should be criticized.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对杨森的急于求成和强制政策要给予批评。

sentences.english: Speculators eager to earn a fast buck often wind up in bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 急于想发横财的投机者到头来往往破产。

sentences.english: Li's itch for extermination was even more unfavorable to the Society of God Worshipers.
sentences.chinese: 而李的急于“进剿”对拜上帝会恐更为不利。

sentences.english: Some people have been so desperate to save their homes, they are taking matters into their own hands.
sentences.chinese: 很多人急于想挽救自己的房屋，他们决定自行其事。

sentences.english: He is anxious to read the share prices.
sentences.chinese: 她急于想了解股票的行情。

sentences.english: But most private agencies are eager to draw a line with property companies.
sentences.chinese: 但多数私人房检员都急于跟这些地产商划清界限。

sentences.english: He drives around Copenhagen, anxious to get to work and ready to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 他开着车在哥本哈根逛来逛去，急于着手开始工作。

sentences.english: State department rimmon, eager to spark.
You'd better go slow in reach-ing a conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 你最好不要急于下结论。

sentences.english: RBR team boss Christian Horner said he is not in a rush to make a decision.
sentences.chinese: 红牛车队的老板霍纳说他并不急于作出决定。

sentences.english: A man in such a hurry as you are to get results seldom learns quickly.
sentences.chinese: 一个人向你这样急于求成是不会有很快进步的。

definition: to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
top priority job/matter of vital importance
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
